gurmukhi: ਦਰਸਨ ਜੋਤਿ ਕੋ ੳੁਦੋਤ ਅਸਚਰਜ ਮੈ ਕਿੰਚਤ ਕਟਾਛ ਕੈ ਬਿਸਮ ਕੋਟਿ ਧਿਅਾਨ ਹੈ
transliteration: Darasan Joti Ko Udot Asacharaj Mai , Kinchat Kataachh Kai Bisam Koti Dhiaan Hai ?
translation: A sight of the divine refulgence of the True Guru is full of astonishment. A momentary glance of grace of the True Guru baffles millions of contemplation.

gurmukhi: ਮੰਦ ਮੁਸਕਾਨਿ ਬਾਨਿ ਪਰਮਦਭੁਤਿ ਗਤਿ ਮਧੁਰ ਬਚਨ ਕੈ ਥਕਤ ਕੋਟਿ ਗਿਅਾਨ ਹੈ
transliteration: Mand Mousakaani Baani Paramadabhouti Gati , Madhur Bachan Kai Dakat Koti Giaan Hai ?
translation: Sweet smiling nature of the True Guru is marvellous. Millions of understandings and perceptions are paltry before his elixir like utterances.

gurmukhi: ੲੇਕ ੳੁਪਕਾਰ ਕੇ ਬਿਥਾਰ ਕੋ ਨ ਪਾਰਾਵਾਰੁ ਕੋਟਿ ੳੁਪਕਾਰ ਸਿਮਰਨ ੳੁਨਮਾਨ ਹੈ
transliteration: Ayk Oupakaar Kay Bidaar Ko N Paaraavaaru , Koti Oupakaar Simaran Ounamaan Hai ?
translation: The grandeur of a blessing of the True Guru is fathomless. And therefore, to remember other good deeds is trifle and meaningless.

gurmukhi: ਦੲਿਅਾਨਿਧਿ ਕ੍ਰਿਪਾਨਿਧਿ ਸੁਖਨਿਧਿ ਸੋਭਾਨਿਧਿ ਮਹਿਮਾ ਨਿਧਾਨ ਗੰਮਿਤਾ ਨ ਕਾਹੂ ਅਾਨ ਹੈ ॥੧੪੨॥
transliteration: Daiaanidhi Kripaanidhi Soukhanidhi Sobhaanidhi , Mahimaa Nidhaan Ganmitaa N Kaahoo Aan Hai ?142?
translation: He is a treasure-house of kindness and ocean of clemency and sea of comforts. He is such a vast storehouse of praise and coffer of grandeur that no one else can reach it. (142)
